meta_description: Press coverage, interviews, and media appearances of Hyejoung Moon - Author and Florist.
og_description: Press coverage, interviews, and media appearances.

1.title: The charm of Tarot is that destiny is set, but it can change every moment by my choices
1.excerpt: Tarot cards don't have a fixed frame from birth like Saju-palja, but the answer changes depending on the current situation, state of mind, and the time the person asks the question.

6.title: Reading your heart even you don't know!
6.excerpt: Following announcer Lee Hye-sung's introduction of the 10 grand prize winners of the 12th Brunch Book, the final work, 'The Cafe That Reads Tarot Cards', has been published.
